verses.roman:
tāṅhāra prakāśa-bheda, advaita-ācārya
kāya-mano-vākye tāṅra bhakti sadā kārya

synonyms: tāṅhāra—His; prakāśa-bheda—separate expansion; advaita-ācārya—Advaita Ācārya; kāya-manaḥ-vākye—by His body, mind and words; tāṅra—His; bhakti—devotion; sadā—always; kārya—occupational duty.
translation: Advaita Ācārya is a separate expansion of Him. He always engages in devotional service with His thoughts, words and actions.
